Package zoo.manager.handlers

Class BaseZoneRepositoryHandler

java.lang.Object
zoo.manager.handlers.BaseZoneRepositoryHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ZoneRepositoryHandler
@Service public class BaseZoneRepositoryHandler extends Object implements ZoneRepositoryHandler
Class, which is used for implementation of interface and handle requests for zone.
Since:
JDK 17

    • findZonesWithTotalExpenses

      public Iterable<ZoneWithHighestExpensesRes> findZonesWithTotalExpenses(org.springframework.data.domain.PageRequest pageRequest)
      Find all zones and return information with sum its expenses per zone.
      Specified by:
      findZonesWithTotalExpenses in interface ZoneRepositoryHandler
      Parameters:
      pageRequest - Object of CLass with information about page and objects per page.
      Returns:
      Iterable object of Class with all founded zone and its expenses. Amount of zones is regulated by provided param with number of page and object per page.
